Reviews.Title: great deal
Reviews.Author: Kathy Reynolds
Reviews.Content: TV arrived on time and my granddaughter loved it. We love that it has DVD built in the TV so that my 3 year old grand daughter can't mess with DVD player.

Reviews.Title: DISSSATISIFIED CUSTOMER
Reviews.Author: Jean Duncan
Reviews.Content: The color quality of the Proscan 24 1080 is not up to expectations but is much better than the sound. The two speakers are located at the back of the set and produces a very " tinny" sound. I could never recommend this particular model.
